body:
Day 10 - Manga 206*
The art is shitty as fuck.
1/10.
Also, sempai, is that supposed to make this good? No, I saw older ones with better art so shut the fuck up and let us give our opinion.
@bublba2020think, no shit this was made 7 years ago look at the numbers it’s in the 200’s bruh. An og doujin
